body: guys i need help! i'm looking for a manga that was about a mother tha goes to the gynecolgist that ends up being his son... they fuck and he shows her with the ultra sound machine how he creampies her and she tells him that she sees how she's ovulating and... i need to know the name of that manga for a homework if u know what i mean... there's no way i'm making this thing up i know i fapped to that but i  can't remember the name... please help my balls will appreciate it...

I agree, @Ravenleaf. I almost missed this one because I blacklist NTR. Netori stuff is usually pretty good. Sometimes it veers too close to netorare though. Personally I would like to see an "evil MC" tag. That would block a lot of the crap I don't like. Netorare almost always has an evil main character.

Since someone will probably whine and gripe about NTR, I'm just gonna put this out there: this is Netori, and this site needs to get better at not confusing the two. (way too many things tagged NTR that should be Netroi)
